rooms.name: Kitchen

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: quiet space dedicated to reading and study with large windows to allow plenty of natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: includes en-suite bathroom; designed for privacy and tranquility following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: three bedrooms to accommodate additional family members and guests, each with natural light access.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: dedicated living space for the staff located conveniently near common areas.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: located in a separate section to ensure privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.location: facing north as per Vastu guidelines to invite positivity
east side of living room and library for maximum sunlight
attached to the master bedroom suite for fresh air

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: two additional bedrooms on this level ensuring natural light via strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: conveniently located near the guest bedrooms for privacy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
